main event: A couple observed a bright light in the sky, resembling a large star, which moved rapidly before disappearing on the night of December 17, 1966.
interesting points: The couple saw the light go out and reappear several times,The light shot across the sky at incredible speed during the sighting,They later found out that many others in Whittier reported similar sightings that night,The sighting involved a glowing sphere that appeared to be shaped like a shining window,Two additional similar objects joined the first one during the observation.
sighted object: a bright light and glowing spheres
witness description: A couple observing the sky from their home
